articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Kumbh Mela: Worshippers feared killed in crowd crush at huge Indian religious festival - BBC.com
articles.description: There are no official numbers yet on how many people may have been injured or killed at the festival.
articles.content:
Samira HussainReporting from Prayagraj
It was absolute chaos at the river bank. Peoples belongings, clothes, shoes, blankets and backpacks were strewn all around. Listless bodies could be seen among… [+544 chars]
